name: YCoreUI
summary: Core components for iOS to accelerate building user interfaces in code.
description: This framework comprises UIView extensions for declarative AutoLayout, UIColor extensions for WCAG 2.0 contrast ratio calculations, and UIScrollView extensions to assist with keyboard avoidance.
authors: Mark Pospesel, Sanjib Chakraborty, Sumit Goswami, Karthik K Manoj, Visakh Tharakan, et al
